title: Consent
description: Never trust a loan shark. Nine years of paying off my debt is turning into forever.A DARK MAFIA ROMANCEWhen Gabriel broke down my door, he took over my body and life. Never with force, but always with clever manipulation. He stripped me of my independence, my defenses, and my clothes and turned me into an addict. My addiction is him.Once, I had dreams and a future. Now, I have fears, scars, and insatiable needs. I'm damaged beyond repair, but if I'm to survive the most dangerous man in Johannesburg, I can't allow him to break me, because broken toys are destined for the garbage Consent concludes The Loan Shark Duet. Dubious (Book 1) must be read first to follow the story.
author: Charmaine Pauls
